Description: Maintaining a list of Active Directory Domain Controllers for validation. Ensuring the list matches expected Domain Controllers can help detect rogue DC's used in an attack known as DCShadow.
Remediation: As this attack requires compromised privileged credentials, remediation is two-fold. First, remove any unknown, unauthorized servers from the environment and then force password changes on all accounts with Domain Admin or higher rights.

References.Text: WHAT IS A DCSHADOW ATTACK AND HOW TO DEFEND AGAINST IT
